org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util

Class ConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util.ConfigReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigFromConnection, ConfigFromFile

    public abstract class ConfigReader
extends Object
    An abstract class providing some common interface for the class that read the configuration (and if the server is running, the monitoring information).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ConnectionHandlerDescriptor adminConnector
      The administration connector.
      protected Set<DN> administrativeUsers
      The set of administrative users.
      protected Set<BackendDescriptor> backends
      The set of backend descriptors.
      static String configFile
      The configuration file full path (-INSTANCE_ROOT-/config/config.ldif).
      protected static OpenDsException environmentSettingException
      The error that occurred when setting the environment (null if no error occurred).
      protected List<Exception> exceptions
      The exceptions that occurred reading the configuration.
      protected boolean isSchemaEnabled
      Whether the schema checking is enabled or not.
      protected String javaVersion
      The java version used to run the server.
      protected Set<ConnectionHandlerDescriptor> listeners
      The set of connection listeners.
      protected int numberConnections
      The number of connections opened on the server.
      protected int replicationPort
      The replication serve port (-1 if the replication server port is not defined).
      protected Schema schema
      The schema used by the server.
      protected Set<TaskEntry> taskEntries
      The task entries.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdministrativeUsers

        public Set<DN> getAdministrativeUsers()
        Returns the Administrative User DNs found in the config.ldif. The set must be unmodifiable (the inheriting classes must take care of this).
        Returns:
        the Administrative User DNs found in the config.ldif.

      • getBackends

        public Set<BackendDescriptor> getBackends()
        Returns the backend descriptors found in the config.ldif. The set must be unmodifiable (the inheriting classes must take care of this).
        Returns:
        the backend descriptors found in the config.ldif.

      • getConnectionHandlers

        public Set<ConnectionHandlerDescriptor> getConnectionHandlers()
        Returns the listener descriptors found in the config.ldif. The set must be unmodifiable (the inheriting classes must take care of this).
        Returns:
        the listeners descriptors found in the config.ldif.

      • getAdminConnector

        public ConnectionHandlerDescriptor getAdminConnector()
        Returns the admin connector.
        Returns:
        the admin connector.

      • getExceptions

        public List<Exception> getExceptions()
        Returns the list of exceptions that were encountered reading the configuration. The list must be unmodifiable (the inheriting classes must take care of this).
        Returns:
        the list of exceptions that were encountered reading the configuration.

      • isConfigRead

        public boolean isConfigRead()
        Returns true if the configuration has been read at least once and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the configuration has been read at least once and false otherwise.

      • getReplicationPort

        public int getReplicationPort()
        Returns the replication server port. -1 if no replication server port is defined.
        Returns:
        the replication server port. -1 if no replication server port is defined.

      • isSchemaEnabled

        public boolean isSchemaEnabled()
        Returns true if the schema check is enabled and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the schema check is enabled and false otherwise.

      • getJavaVersion

        public String getJavaVersion()
        Returns the java version used to run the server. null if no java version is used (because the server is down).
        Returns:
        the java version used to run the server. null if no java version is used (because the server is down).

      • getOpenConnections

        public int getOpenConnections()
        Returns the number of open connections on the server. -1 if the server is down.
        Returns:
        the number of open connections on the server.

      • getSchema

      • readSchema

        protected Schema readSchema()
                     throws ConfigException,
                            InitializationException,
                            DirectoryException
        Reads the schema from the files.
        Returns:
        the schema
        Throws:
        ConfigException - if an error occurs reading the schema.
        InitializationException - if an error occurs initializing configuration to read schema.
        DirectoryException - if there is an error registering the minimal objectclasses.

      • getVLVSortOrder

        protected List<VLVSortOrder> getVLVSortOrder(String s)
        Method that transforms the VLV sort order value as it is defined in the schema to a list of VLVSortOrder objects.
        Parameters:
        s - the string in the configuration.
        Returns:
        a list of VLVSortOrder objects.
